          <title>
            <string language="en">Looking at things through refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrachten von von Sachen durch Brechung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regarder des choses par la réfraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhando coisas com o refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guardando le cose con rifrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέταση τα πράγματα μέσω της διάθλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mirar cosas con la refracción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the fish seems to be through light refraction in your eye.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eyes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie der Fisch scheint, 
durch helle Brechung in Ihrem Auge zu sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le poisson 
semble être par la réfraction légère dans votre oeil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o peixe parece ser 
com o refraction claro em seu olho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il pesce sembra 
essere con la rifrazione chiara nel vostro occhio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το ψάρι φαίνεται 
να είναι μέσω της ελαφριάς διάθλασης στο μάτι σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el pescado se 
parece estar con la refracción ligera en su ojo.</string>
          </description>
